T02D3641:253a-1: shr'i bh'u ta d'a ma ra sam kshipta s'a dha nam /
T02D3641:253a-3: dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa /
T02D3641:253a-4: dpal 'byung po 'dul byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3641:253a-5: tshangs pa brgya byin lus ngan sogs //
T02D3641:253a-6: myos rnams 'joms par mkhas pa yi //
T02D3641:253a-8: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D3641:253a-9: mdor bsdus man ngag rnam dag pas //
T02D3641:253a-10: mdor bsdus 'dod phyir sbyar bar bya //
T02D3641:253a-11: gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo sogs 'grub //
T02D3641:253a-12: bdag snying ya mtshan skyes nas bris //
T02D3641:253b-0: dang por re zhig sngags pas @253b thugs kar zla
T02D3641:253b-1: ba la khams gsum rnam par gsal ba'i 'od zer
T02D3641:253b-3: lus la ram yig dmar po'i sa bon rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3641:253b-4: de nas dag pa'i lcags kyu'i rnam pas mdun du
T02D3641:253b-5: 'byung po 'dul byed gdan drangs nas bla na med
T02D3641:253b-6: pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun gyis mngon par mchod
T02D3641:253b-7: nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3641:253b-8: de nas kunda dang mtshungs dri med rnam rgyas mtshan mor byed pa yi //
T02D3641:253b-9: steng du dung 'dra h'um yig bkod pa'i gnas dbus zla ba'i dkyil //
T02D3641:253b-10: shin tu 'bar byed ma lus yongs gyur yang dag las //
T02D3641:253b-11: sna tshogs pa yi chu skyes 'dab ma 'jam po blta bar bya //
T02D3641:253b-12: de nas de yi dbus su aam yig yongs gyur sman gyi dbang po ste //
T02D3641:253b-13: h'um yig snying po h'um yig yongs gyur las //
T02D3641:253b-14: mthing nag 'bar ba'i rdo rje rnam par bsgom //
T02D3641:253b-15: de dag yongs gyur skad cig gis blta zhing //
T02D3641:253b-16: mche gtsigs sku mdog mthing nag 'byung po rnams //
T02D3641:253b-17: skrag mdzad rang bzhin 'gro la nyer phan mdzad ;
T02D3641:253b-18: / khyab bya gcig chags rgyu yis 'phrog byed dang //
T02D3641:253b-19: dbang phyug gzhon sogs bdud drag las gcig pa //
T02D3641:253b-20: zhal ni cung zad mche gtsigs shing //
T02D3641:253b-22: dbu skra dmar ser gyen brdzes mthing //
T02D3641:253b-23: na bza' sngon pos sku la brgyan //
T02D3641:253b-24: phyag g-yas na rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D3641:253b-25: g-yon na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub mdzad pa /
T02D3641:253b-26: thod pa lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D3641:253b-27: phyag g-yon na thod pa dang rtse gsum bsnams pa /
T02D3641:253b-28: g-yas na da ma ru bsnams pa /
T02D3641:253b-29: ral pa dmar ser gyis dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3641:253b-31: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' bsnams pa /
T02D3641:253b-32: 'byung po'i dbang po gzhan las rgyal ba /
T02D3641:253b-33: zhabs g-yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3641:253b-34: phyag gnyis dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi phyag rgya bcings pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3641:253b-36: ming med gnyis po bcing bya ste //
T02D3641:253b-37: mdzub mo gnyis po bskum par bya //
T02D3641:253b-38: mthe'u chung gung mo de bzhin du //
T02D3641:253b-39: mtheb chen gyis ni mnan par bya //
T02D3641:253b-40: klu brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa ste /
T02D3641:253b-41: de la stobs kyi rgyu sngon pos dbu skra bcings pa /
T02D3641:253b-42: 'jog po dmar pos mgul rgyan byas pa /
T02D3641:253b-43: dga' bo dang nye dga' bos rna rgyan byas pa /
T02D3641:253b-44: 'di dag ni ser por gcig pa'o //
T02D3641:254a-0: mtha' yas dkar pos tshangs skud @254a * //
T02D3641:254a-2: nor rgyas dkar pos rked rgyan byas pa /
T02D3641:254a-3: phyag rgya'i phyag dag la rigs ldan dngul chu'i kha dog lta bu'o //
T02D3641:254a-4: phyag gzhan dag la de bzhin du dung skyong dkar po'o //
T02D3641:254a-5: zhabs gdub la padma dang padma chen po dag go //
T02D3641:254a-6: 'di dag ni dmar por gcig pa'o //
T02D3641:254a-7: de bzhin du spyan gnyis dmar por gyur pa'i dpal 'byung po 'dul byed bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
T02D3641:254a-8: khro ba dang bcas shing gcig tu 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa /
T02D3641:254a-12: mgo rnams su bsrung ba'i don du phyag rgyas reg par bya'o //
T02D3641:254a-13: bsam gtan gyis ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3641:254a-18: skyes bu dam pa nges par yon tan don gnyer rnams kyi phyir //
T02D3641:254a-19: gang zhig gis kyang de bris cis kyang bdag gis gsal byas pa //
T02D3641:254a-20: dge ba gang des rnam par snang mdzad thong gyur nas ;
T02D3641:254a-21: /'jig rten gsum po'i sdig pa mtha' dag 'joms par
T02D3641:254a-22: shog / dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs
